command.name: GetCurOp
command.description: Return the name of the current operation

responsevalue.name: GetCurOp_Return
responsevalue.description: The name of the current operation

command.name: SetConnOption
command.description: Change a connection option

parameter.name: OptionName
parameter.description: The name of the option to change. Currently supported options: FullErrors

parameter.name: OptionValue
parameter.description: The new value for the option

command.name: Status
command.description: Return current service status. This is a listing of the currently connected clients

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The search number to use for holding the results

value.name: StatusSettingName
value.description: The name of the setting

value.name: StatusSettingValue
value.description: The value of the setting

command.name: ReleaseSerialPort
command.description: Releases any clients connected to Sophia through the serial port. After the serial ports are released Sophia will broadcast the following custom windows message; "SOPHIA HAS ENTERED SERVICE MODE"

responsevalue.name: ReleaseSerialPort_Return
responsevalue.description: Boolean value stating if the release was successful

command.name: Version
command.description: Return the version of the service component and the supported protocol version

responsevalue.name: Version_Service
responsevalue.description: The version of the service component

responsevalue.name: Version_Protocol
responsevalue.description: The version of the supported protocol

responsevalue.name: Version_CommandDef
responsevalue.description: The version of the loaded command definition file

responsevalue.name: Version_System
responsevalue.description: The overall system version.

command.name: GetRows
command.description: Retrieve a number of rows from a previously executed numbered search

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The numbered search to use for this command. An error will be returned if no results exist for this search

parameter.name: StartRow
parameter.description: The number of the first row returned. Use 1 to start at the beginning of the results

parameter.name: RowCount
parameter.description: The number of rows to return with this command call. Use -1 to return all rows following the specified start row

parameter.name: FormatList
parameter.description: The name of the format list to use for formatting results

responsevalue.name: GetRows_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of rows actually returned.

command.name: GetCount
command.description: Return the number of rows cached from a previously executed numbered search

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The numbered search to use for this command. If no results exist for this search then 0 will be returned

responsevalue.name: GetCount_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of rows associated with this search

command.name: GetLastError
command.description: Return the error text associated with the last error on this connection

responsevalue.name: GetLastError_Return
responsevalue.description: The error text

command.name: LookupError
command.description: Return the error text associated with the supplied error number

parameter.name: ErrorCode
parameter.description: The error number to use

responsevalue.name: LookupError_Return
responsevalue.description: The error string. This will include any replacement tokens

command.name: SetLength
command.description: Set the returned length of a field associated with a format list

parameter.name: FormatList
parameter.description: The ID of the format list to use

parameter.name: FieldName
parameter.description: The name of the field to format

parameter.name: Length
parameter.description: The maximum string length to set for this field

command.name: EnableField
command.description: Enable a field for a specified format list

parameter.name: FormatList
parameter.description: The ID of the format list to use

parameter.name: FieldName
parameter.description: The name of the field to enable/show

command.name: DisableField
command.description: Disable a field for a specified format list

parameter.name: FormatList
parameter.description: The ID of the format list to use

parameter.name: FieldName
parameter.description: The name of the field to disable/hide

command.name: EffFormat
command.description: This command returns a rowset that lists the effective format for each return field associated with the supplied command, in the context of the supplied format list

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The output to place the results into

parameter.name: CommandName
parameter.description: The name of the command to check

parameter.name: FormatList
parameter.description: The name of the format list

value.name: FieldName
value.description: The name of a return field (either a response value or part of the row format)

value.name: FormatSource
value.description: The format list supplying a format for the field. This will be either the name of the supplied format list, (default) or (none)

command.name: RoomIpChanged
command.description: [Internal] Used by back end services to indicate that one or more room IP addresses have changed.

command.name: MasterIpChanged
command.description: [Internal] Used by back end services to indicate that the master IP address has changed.

parameter.name: MasterName
parameter.description: The host name of the DigiFi Master

parameter.name: MasterAddress
parameter.description: The IP address of the DigiFi Master

command.name: FindAllRooms
command.description: Scan the network for DigiFi rooms, and update the internal rooms collection.

parameter.name: TimeoutPerHost
parameter.description: The number of ms to wait per host, before signalling a timeout.

responsevalue.name: FindAllRooms_Return
responsevalue.description: Returns the number of rooms located by the scan.

command.name: FindNewRooms
command.description: Scan the network for DigiFi rooms, and update the internal rooms collection with any new rooms located.

parameter.name: TimeoutPerHost
parameter.description: The number of ms to wait per host, before signalling a timeout.

responsevalue.name: FindNewRooms_Return
responsevalue.description: Returns the number of new rooms located by the scan.

command.name: RemoveOldRooms
command.description: Scan the network for DigiFi rooms, remove from the internal rooms collection any rooms which do not respond.

parameter.name: TimeoutPerHost
parameter.description: The number of ms to wait per host, before signalling a timeout.

responsevalue.name: RemoveOldRooms_Return
responsevalue.description: Returns the number of rooms removed.

command.name: ServiceMode
command.description: Return the details of the current mode in which the service is operating (full mode, demo mode etc)

responsevalue.name: ServiceMode_ModeValue
responsevalue.description: Numeric value of the current service mode.

responsevalue.name: ServiceMode_ModeName
responsevalue.description: Description of the current service mode.

command.name: GetSearchOffset
command.description: Retrieve the offset of a row in a previously executed numbered search which matches a criteria

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The numbered search to use for this command. An error will be returned if no results exist for this search

parameter.name: SearchValue
parameter.description: The string to search for

parameter.name: SearchColumn
parameter.description: The name of the column to match within the search results. An error is returned if the column does not exist in the specified search.

parameter.name: SearchType
parameter.description: Type of search: 1=Contains, 2=Starts With (default), 3=Exact Match, 4=Does Not Contain, 5=Range

responsevalue.name: GetSearchOffset_Return
responsevalue.description: The offset within the search of the matched row, -1 if none found.

responsevalue.name: GetSearchOffset_Count
responsevalue.description: the number of rows found by the search, this only applies to range search and will return the number of rows in the range unless the start of the range cannot be found. For all other search types this value will be -1

command.name: FilterSearch
command.description: Create and populate a new search result with all rows matching filter criteria from a previously executed numbered search

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The new numbered search to use for this command.

parameter.name: TargetSearchNumber
parameter.description: The existing numbered search to filter for this command. An error will be returned if no results exist for this search

parameter.name: SearchValue
parameter.description: The string to search for

parameter.name: SearchColumn
parameter.description: The name of the column to match within the search results. An error is returned if the column does not exist in the specified search.

parameter.name: SearchType
parameter.description: Type of search: 1=Contains, 2=Starts With (default), 3=Exact Match, 4=Does Not Contain

responsevalue.name: FilterSearch_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of rows in the newly-created search result.

command.name: SortSearch
command.description: Create and populate a new search result with all rows from a previously executed numbered search sorted on the requested column

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The new numbered search to use for this command.

parameter.name: TargetSearchNumber
parameter.description: The existing numbered search to sort for this command. An error will be returned if no results exist for this search

parameter.name: SortColumn
parameter.description: The column name to use when sorting the results.

parameter.name: SortOrder
parameter.description: The sort order to use in sorting the results (ASC or DESC).

responsevalue.name: SortSearch_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of rows in the newly-created search result.

command.name: SetRippingStatus
command.description: [Internal] Used by back-end ripping services to set the status of the current ripping operation

parameter.name: Artist
parameter.description: Name of the artist

parameter.name: Album
parameter.description: Name of the album

parameter.name: Tracks
parameter.description: Number of tracks on the CD

parameter.name: TracksRipped
parameter.description: Number of tracks ripped so far

parameter.name: Errors
parameter.description: Number of errors encountered so far

parameter.name: TimeTaken
parameter.description: Time taken so far

parameter.name: TimeLeft
parameter.description: Estimated time remaining to rip the CD

parameter.name: Track
parameter.description: Name of the current track being ripped

parameter.name: TrackPercent
parameter.description: Percentage of current track ripped

parameter.name: UserMessage
parameter.description: Any user messages generated by the ripping operation

parameter.name: LookupProviderUsed
parameter.description: The name of the CD lookup provider that returned information about the CD

parameter.name: SourceFolder
parameter.description: The ripping source folder name

command.name: SetCDDetected
command.description: [Internal] Used by back-end ripping services to set the CD detected flag

parameter.name: CDDetected
parameter.description: CD detected flag

command.name: GetSystemTime
command.description: Retrieve the current system (device) date and time.

responsevalue.name: GetSystemTime_Date
responsevalue.description: The current system date.

responsevalue.name: GetSystemTime_Time
responsevalue.description: The current system time.

command.name: GetHostDetails
command.description: Retrieve the host name and working IP address from the Sophia host.

responsevalue.name: GetHostDetails_Name
responsevalue.description: The host name.

responsevalue.name: GetHostDetails_Address
responsevalue.description: The IP address being used by the Sophia host. This may be the loopback address if the NoSatellites registry setting is set to 1.

command.name: SetRecycleBinStatus
command.description: Set the current status of the recycle bin process. Called by Astoria.

parameter.name: IsBusy
parameter.description: Indicates if the recycle bin is currently busy being emptied.

parameter.name: Status
parameter.description: A description of the current status of the recycle bin. If the bin is not busy then this will be empty. If the bin is busy then this contains a description of the current operation.

parameter.name: PercentComplete
parameter.description: The percentage complete of the current process, if the recycle bin is busy.

command.name: GetRecycleBinStatus
command.description: Get the current status of the recycle bin process.

responsevalue.name: IsBusy
responsevalue.description: Indicates if the recycle bin is currently busy being emptied.

responsevalue.name: Status
responsevalue.description: A description of the current status of the recycle bin. If the bin is not busy then this will be empty. If the bin is busy then this contains a description of the current operation.

responsevalue.name: PercentComplete
responsevalue.description: The percentage complete of the current process, if the recycle bin is busy.

command.name: GetSetupVal
command.description: Return a setup confirmation checksum

responsevalue.name: GetSetupVal_Return
responsevalue.description: The checksum value

command.description: Submit album/playlist(s) for playback on a specified room, either replacing the current playlist or adding to it.

parameter.description: The room ID to use for this command.

parameter.name: Replace
parameter.description: Replace the current playlist or add to it.

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of album/playlist(s) to play.

responsevalue.name: TracksAdded
responsevalue.description: The number of tracks added by this action.

command.name: PlayAll
command.description: Plays all items in a group i.e. Albums, Artists, Genres etc.

parameter.name: RoomID
parameter.description: The room ID to use for this command.

parameter.name: Replace
parameter.description: Replace the current playlist or add to it.

parameter.name: PlayScope
parameter.description: The scope of the request: All (0), Server (1), Share (2) or Device (3)

parameter.name: ScopeKey
parameter.description: The key for the scope if PlayScope is set to device or sharthis could be a relative or absolute address

parameter.name: PlayType
parameter.description: The type of entries to play: Artists (0), Albums (1), Genres (2), Performers (3), Playlists (4), Conductors (5) or Composers (6)

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of album/playlist(s) to play.

responsevalue.name: TracksAdded
responsevalue.description: The number of tracks added by this action.

command.name: GetOutputChannels
command.description: Get a list of defined output channels for a given room or host name. Note: An output device, or local output device, is a sound card associated with a given host. An external output device is a standalone output device, such as a UPnP media renderer. An output channel is a Cirin player instance, which is associated with either an output device or an external output device.

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results (listing) into

parameter.name: RoomID
parameter.description: The room ID to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

parameter.name: HostName
parameter.description: The host name (or host address) to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

responsevalue.name: GetOutputChannels_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of output devices in the listing.

value.name: InitString
value.description: An initialisation string which describes the output channel.

value.name: ChannelID
value.description: ID of the output channel.

command.name: GetExternalStorages
command.description: List all located network shares (which may, or may not, contain music)

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results into.

parameter.name: AvailableOnly
parameter.description: If this parameter is true then only shares which are flagged active and with a state of "Online" will be returned. If this parameter is false then all shares will be returned. Defaults to false.

responsevalue.name: GetExternalStorages_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of shares in the result set.

value.name: StorageKey
value.description: Unique identifier of the external storage

value.name: IPAddress
value.description: The IP Address of the host which provides the share.

value.name: HostName
value.description: The name of the host which provides the share.

value.name: ShareName
value.description: The name of the share.

value.name: FullSharePath
value.description: The full share path, consisting of the host name and the share name, UNC formatted.

value.name: State
value.description: The current status of the storage share. This can take one of the values: Unknown, Scanning, Updating, HostScan, Error, Online, Offline, PendingMusicScan

value.name: LastState
value.description: The last status of the storage share. This can take one of the values: Unknown, Scanning, Updating, HostScan, Error, Online, Offline, PendingMusicScan

value.name: Active
value.description: The active status of the storage. If true then the storage will be scanned for music files, and the music made available to the DigiFi. If false then the share will be ignored.

value.name: Created
value.description: The date the external storage record was created.

value.name: Modified
value.description: The date the external storage record was last modified.

value.name: LastScanDate
value.description: The date the external storage share was last scanned.

value.name: LastScanTime
value.description: The time the external storage share was last scanned.

value.name: UserName
value.description: User name required to access the host/share.

value.name: Password
value.description: Password required to access the host/share.

value.name: ScanIgnore
value.description: Should this share or host be ignored by the scanning system

responsevalue.name: AddExternalStorage_Username
responsevalue.description: The username used to connect to the remote host

responsevalue.name: AddExternalStorage_Password
responsevalue.description: The encoded password used to connect to the remote host

command.name: ScanForExternalStorages
command.description: Scans the network for external storage shares and updates the database accordingly.

responsevalue.name: ScanForExternalStorages_Return
responsevalue.description: Success flag for the operation.

command.name: RescanExternalStorages
command.description: Schedules a rescan of external storage shares and updates the database accordingly.

responsevalue.name: RescanExternalStorages_Return
responsevalue.description: Success flag for the operation.

command.name: ScanExternalStorage
command.description: Forces a share scan on a given external storage share and updates the database accordingly.

parameter.name: StorageKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the external storage share to be fetched

responsevalue.name: ScanExternalStorage_Return
responsevalue.description: Success flag for the operation.

command.name: RemoveExternalStorage
command.description: Removes the record of an offline external storage share. This command will fail if the external storage share is flagged as online.

parameter.name: StorageKey
parameter.description: The storage key value to use for this command.

responsevalue.name: RemoveExternalStorage_Return
responsevalue.description: Success flag for the operation.

command.name: GetExternalStorageDetail
command.description: Get the Details of a single external storage share

parameter.name: StorageKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the external storage share to be fetched

responsevalue.name: StorageKey
responsevalue.description: Unique identifier of the external storage

responsevalue.name: IPAddress
responsevalue.description: The IP Address of the host which provides the share.

responsevalue.name: HostName
responsevalue.description: The name of the host which provides the share.

responsevalue.name: ShareName
responsevalue.description: The name of the share.

responsevalue.name: FullSharePath
responsevalue.description: The full share path, consisting of the host name and the share name, UNC formatted.

responsevalue.name: State
responsevalue.description: The current status of the storage share. This can take one of the values: Unknown, Scanning, Updating, HostScan, Error, Online, Offline

responsevalue.name: LastState
responsevalue.description: The last status of the storage share. This can take one of the values: Unknown, Scanning, Updating, HostScan, Error, Online, Offline

responsevalue.name: Active
responsevalue.description: The active status of the storage. If true then the storage will be scanned for music files, and the music made available to the DigiFi. If false then the share will be ignored.

responsevalue.name: Created
responsevalue.description: The date the external storage record was created.

responsevalue.name: Modified
responsevalue.description: The date the external storage record was last modified.

responsevalue.name: LastScanDate
responsevalue.description: The date the external storage share was last scanned.

responsevalue.name: LastScanTime
responsevalue.description: The time the external storage share was last scanned.

responsevalue.name: UserName
responsevalue.description: User name required to access the host/share.

responsevalue.name: Password
responsevalue.description: Password required to access the host/share.

responsevalue.name: ScanIgnore
responsevalue.description: Should this share or host be ignored by the scanning system

command.name: UpdateExternalStorage
command.description: Updates the details of an existing external storage share. Note: Data elements which are under the control of the ScanManager cannot be modified using this command.

parameter.name: StorageKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the external storage share to be Updated

parameter.name: IPAddress
parameter.description: The IP Address of the host which provides the share.

parameter.name: HostName
parameter.description: The name of the host which provides the share.

parameter.name: ShareName
parameter.description: The name of the share.

parameter.name: UserName
parameter.description: User name required to access the host/share.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: Password required to access the host/share.

responsevalue.name: UpdateExternalStorage_Return
responsevalue.description: Returns True/False reflecting the success of the update

command.name: NewOutputChannel
command.description: Create a new output channel on the specified host. You identify the host on which the channel is to be created by either specifying the host name or the ID of an existing room on the host.

parameter.name: RoomID
parameter.description: The room ID to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

parameter.name: HostName
parameter.description: The host name (or host address) to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

parameter.name: ChannelNumber
parameter.description: The number of the new channel to create. This command will fail if the channel number is already in use.

parameter.name: InitString
parameter.description: The initialisation string to use for this channel. The initialisation string describes the device associated with the channel.

responsevalue.name: NewOutputChannel_Return
responsevalue.description: True if the command was successful.

command.name: UpdateOutputChannel
command.description: Update an output channel on the specified host. You identify the host on which the channel is to be created by either specifying the host name or the ID of an existing room on the host.

parameter.name: RoomID
parameter.description: The room ID to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

parameter.name: HostName
parameter.description: The host name (or host address) to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

parameter.name: ChannelNumber
parameter.description: The number of the channel to update. This command will fail if the channel number is not defined.

parameter.name: InitString
parameter.description: The initialisation string to use for this channel. The initialisation string describes the device associated with the channel.

responsevalue.name: UpdateOutputChannel_Return
responsevalue.description: True if the command was successful.

command.name: DeleteOutputChannel
command.description: Delete an output channel from the specified host. You identify the host on which the channel is to be created by either specifying the host name or the ID of an existing room on the host.

parameter.name: RoomID
parameter.description: The room ID to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

parameter.name: HostName
parameter.description: The host name (or host address) to use for this command. Supply EITHER a RoomID OR a HostName.

parameter.name: ChannelNumber
parameter.description: The number of the channel to delete. This command will fail if the channel number is not defined.

responsevalue.name: DeleteOutputChannel_Return
responsevalue.description: True if the command was successful.

command.name: SetDriveUsage
command.description: Changes the usage of a drive, between audio store and backup.

parameter.name: DriveKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the drive to modify.

parameter.name: Usage
parameter.description: The new usage for the drive. This can be 0 (Audio store) or 1 (Backup).

parameter.name: ForceChange
parameter.description: If this is false then the usage of the drive will be changed if it is unused. If the drive is in use then the command will fail. If this is set to true then the usage will be applied regardless of drive status.

responsevalue.name: SetDriveUsage_Success
responsevalue.description: Returns True/False reflecting the success of the update.

responsevalue.name: SetDriveUsage_DriveInUse
responsevalue.description: Flag which indicates if the commandf failure is due to a drive being in use.

responsevalue.name: SetDriveUsage_Message
responsevalue.description: Contains the error message if the command fails.

command.name: BackupDrive
command.description: Initiates the backup of the music folder from one drive, onto the backup folder of another drive. Both drives must be defined system drives marked with the correct usage.

parameter.name: SourceDriveKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the source drive. This drive must be marked as an audio drive. If this drive contains the AppPath then all the DigiFi binaries will also be backed up (and covers etc).

parameter.name: DestDriveKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the destination drive. This drive must be marked as a backup drive.

parameter.name: BackupType
parameter.description: The type of backup to perform. This can take one of the values: 0 (Full), 1 (Differential).

parameter.name: NoFileCheck
parameter.description: If this parameter is set to true then the backup process will not check for suspicious files.

responsevalue.name: BackupDrive_Success
responsevalue.description: Returns True/False reflecting the success of the update.

responsevalue.name: BackupDrive_Message
responsevalue.description: Contains the error message if the command fails.

command.name: StopBackupDrive
command.description: Attempt to stop the current drive backup process.

responsevalue.name: StopBackupDrive_Success
responsevalue.description: Returns True/False reflecting the success of the update.

responsevalue.name: StopBackupDrive_Message
responsevalue.description: Contains the error if the command fails.

command.name: GetBackupStatus
command.description: Retrieve the current status of the system backup process.

responsevalue.name: Backup_SourceDrive
responsevalue.description: The drive letter of the source drive. This may be empty if no backup is in progress.

responsevalue.name: Backup_DestDrive
responsevalue.description: The drive letter of the destination drive. This may be empty if no backup is in progress.

responsevalue.name: Backup_Type
responsevalue.description: The type of backup selected. This can take one of the following values: Full or Differential.

responsevalue.name: Backup_Status
responsevalue.description: The backup status. This can take one of the following values: Failed, Idle, Initialising, Running, Stopping.

responsevalue.name: Backup_CurrentFile
responsevalue.description: The path of the current file being processed.

responsevalue.name: Backup_LastError
responsevalue.description: The last error which occurred. Only set when the status is "Failed"

responsevalue.name: Backup_TimeTaken
responsevalue.description: The time taken by the backup process.

responsevalue.name: Backup_TimeRemaining
responsevalue.description: The estimated time remaining.

responsevalue.name: Backup_SourceFileCount
responsevalue.description: The total number of files which will be backed up.

responsevalue.name: Backup_SourceFolderCount
responsevalue.description: The total number of folders which will be backed up.

responsevalue.name: Backup_SourceByteCount
responsevalue.description: The total number of bytes which will be backed up.

responsevalue.name: Backup_ProcessedFileCount
responsevalue.description: The number of files which have been processed by the backup.

responsevalue.name: Backup_ProcessedFolderCount
responsevalue.description: The number of folders which have been processed by the backup.

responsevalue.name: Backup_ProcessedByteCount
responsevalue.description: The number of bytes which have been processed by the backup.

responsevalue.name: Backup_ErrorCount
responsevalue.description: Total number of errors encountered in the backup.

responsevalue.name: Backup_ErrorFileCount
responsevalue.description: Total number of files which were not processed by the backup, due to errors.

responsevalue.name: Backup_ErrorByteCount
responsevalue.description: The number of bytes which were not processed by the backup, due to errors.

command.name: AddNewBackupJob
command.description: Create a new backup job

parameter.name: SourceDriveAddress
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the Drive to back up music from.

parameter.name: DestinationDriveAddress
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the Drive to back up music to.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: The name of the backup job (can be empty).

parameter.name: BackupType
parameter.description: The type of backup being scheduled (0 - full backup, 1 - differential backup).

parameter.name: BackupPeriod
parameter.description: A value which determines how often the backup job will run (0 - once only, 1 - daily, 2 - weekly, 3 - monthly).

parameter.name: PeriodValue
parameter.description: A value which indicates when in the given period the backup job will run. Day of the week for weeklies, day of the month for monthlies, ignored for run once jobs.

parameter.name: RunDate
parameter.description: The date on which the job will be run. This is only used by run once jobs.

parameter.name: RunTime
parameter.description: The time at which the job will be run. This is used to construct the next run date and time for all job types.

responsevalue.name: AddNewBackupJob_Return
responsevalue.description: The key value of the new backup job. This value will be zero if the backup job could not be created.

command.name: UpdateBackupJob
command.description: Update an existing backup job. NOTE: A running job cannot be updated.

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the backup job to update.

parameter.name: SourceDriveAddress
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the Drive to back up music from.

parameter.name: DestinationDriveAddress
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the Drive to back up music to.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: The name of to give the backup job (can be empty).

parameter.name: BackupType
parameter.description: The type of backup being scheduled (0 - full backup, 1 - differential backup).

parameter.name: BackupPeriod
parameter.description: A value which determines how often the backup job will run (0 - once only, 1 - daily, 2 - weekly, 3 - monthly).

parameter.name: PeriodValue
parameter.description: A value which indicates when in the given period the backup job will run. Day of the week for weeklies, day of the month for monthlies, ignored for run once jobs.

parameter.name: RunDate
parameter.description: The date on which the job will be run. This is only used by run once jobs, to construct the next run date.

parameter.name: RunTime
parameter.description: The time at which the job will be run. This is used to construct the next run date and time for all job types.

responsevalue.name: UpdateBackupJob_Return
responsevalue.description: A flag which indicates if the update was successful.

command.name: DeleteBackupJob
command.description: Delete an existing backup job. NOTE: A running job cannot be deleted.

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the backup job to delete.

responsevalue.name: DeleteBackupJob_Return
responsevalue.description: A flag which indicates if the delete operation was successful.

command.name: GetBackupJobs
command.description: List all the defined backup jobs.

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results (listing) into.

responsevalue.name: GetBackupJobs_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of backup jobs in the listing.

value.name: BackupJobKey
value.description: The key value of the backup job.

value.name: SourceDriveKey
value.description: The key value of the Drive to back up music from.

value.name: DestinationDriveKey
value.description: The key value of the Drive to back up music to.

value.name: Name

command.name: GetBackupLogs
command.description: List all backup log entries, or all entries associated with a given backup job.

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results (listing) into.

parameter.name: Address

value.name: TotalFiles
value.description: Total number of files processed.

value.name: TotalKiloBytes
value.description: Total number of kilokytes processed.

value.name: TotalErrors
value.description: Total number of errors encountered.

command.name: ChangeNetworkDhcp
command.description: Configure a network adapter to use a DHCP obtained IP address.

parameter.name: DeviceID
parameter.description: The device ID of the adapter to configure (as returned by GetActiveNetworkAdapters).

parameter.name: RestartDevice
parameter.description: If true then restart the DigiFi device if the command is successful. Defaults to False.

responsevalue.name: WmiReturnCode
responsevalue.description: The WMI return code associated with the config change (0 indicates success, 1 indicates success and device requires restart, all other values indicate failure).

command.name: ChangeNetworkStatic
command.description: Configure a network adapter to use a static IP address.

parameter.name: DeviceID
parameter.description: The device ID of the adapter to configure (as returned by GetActiveNetworkAdapters).

parameter.name: IpAddress
parameter.description: The static IP address to use.

parameter.name: SubnetMask
parameter.description: The subnet mask to use with the IP address.

parameter.name: DefaultGateway
parameter.description: The IP address of the default gateway.

parameter.name: DnsServer
parameter.description: The IP address of the DNS server. This can be a comma separated list of addresses.

parameter.name: RestartDevice
parameter.description: If true then restart the DigiFi device if the command is successful. Defaults to False.

responsevalue.name: WmiReturnCode
responsevalue.description: The WMI return code associated with the config change (0 indicates success, 1 indicates success and device requires restart, all other values indicate failure).

command.name: ChangeNetworkAutoIP
command.description: Configure a network adapter to use an auto-IP address. This is an address generated using a range of IP addresses and the adapter's MAC address.

parameter.name: DeviceID
parameter.description: The device ID of the adapter to configure (as returned by GetActiveNetworkAdapters).

parameter.name: AutoIpRange
parameter.description: The range of addresses from which the address will be selected. The range is expressed as a minimum and maximum address, separated by a colon.

parameter.name: DefaultGateway
parameter.description: The IP address of the default gateway.

parameter.name: DnsServer
parameter.description: The IP address of the DNS server. This can be a comma separated list of addresses.

parameter.name: RestartDevice
parameter.description: If true then restart the DigiFi device if the command is successful. Defaults to False.

responsevalue.name: WmiReturnCode
responsevalue.description: The WMI return code associated with the config change (0 indicates success, 1 indicates success and device requires restart, all other values indicate failure).

command.name: ChangeNetworkWorkgroup
command.description: Change the SMB workgroup, to which the DigiFi device belongs.

parameter.name: Workgroup
parameter.description: The name of the new workgroup.

responsevalue.name: WmiReturnCode
responsevalue.description: The WMI return code associated with the config change (0 indicates success, 1 indicates success and device requires restart, all other values indicate failure).

command.name: ChangeNetworkMachineName
command.description: Change the name of the DigiFi device. NOTE: This command is exposed from Sophia in order to allow it to be used from other services, but is for internal use only.

parameter.name: MachineName
parameter.description: The new machine name.

responsevalue.name: WmiReturnCode
responsevalue.description: The WMI return code associated with the config change (0 indicates success, 1 indicates success and device requires restart, all other values indicate failure).

command.name: ChangeSystemSerialNumber
command.description: Change the serial number of the DigiFi device. NOTE: The serial number of a device can only be changed once, and is normally set by the manufacturer, so expect this command to fail :)

parameter.name: SerialNumber
parameter.description: The new serial number.

responsevalue.name: Success
responsevalue.description: True if the serial number was changed, false otherwise.

command.name: ProcessEmbeddedInit
command.description: Force the device to process the embedded initialisation file. This command is for internal use and not expected to be called for any other purpose.

responsevalue.name: ProcessEmbeddedInit_Report
responsevalue.description: A report containing details about each step of the initialisation.

command.name: RestartDevice
command.description: Restart the DigiFi device.

command.name: GetNetworkActiveAdapters
command.description: List all active (connected) network adapters.

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results (listing) into

parameter.name: IncludeWireless
parameter.description: If true then wireless adapters will be included in the returned results, otherwise only wired adapters will be returned.

responsevalue.name: GetNetworkActiveAdapters_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of network adapters in the listing.

value.name: Description

value.name: DefaultGateway

value.name: DnsServer

command.name: GetNetworkWorkgroup

command.description: Lists additional details for requested albums

parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results (listing) into

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: Mutliple absolute or relative addresses of albums to search(space seperated)

parameter.name: SortColumn
parameter.description: The column name(s) to use when sorting the results. Multiple columns can be supplied delimited by a comma.

parameter.name: SortOrder
parameter.description: The sort order to use in sorting the results (ASC or DESC). If multiple columns supplied for SortColumn then corresponding orders can be supplied delimited by a comma.

parameter.name: RemoteImagePath
parameter.description: If true a URL will be returned that can be used to download the cover art, otherwise a locl path will be retruned

parameter.name: ImageSize
parameter.description: The size of image required. 1 = small (61x61), 2 = medium (126x126), 3 = large (320x320), 4 = extra large (640x640).

value.description: Unique identifier of the genre of the album

value.description: The name of the genre of the album

value.name: SubGenreKey
value.description: Unique identifier of the sub-genre of the album

value.name: SubGenre
value.description: The name of the sub-genre of the album

value.name: TrackCount
value.description: Number of tracks on the album

value.name: LowQuality
value.description: Indicates whether a low quality copy of the Album is maintained.

value.name: StorageKey
value.description: Unique identifier of the share/device of the album (0 for Server)

value.name: StorageName
value.description: The name of the share/device of the album (Empty string for server)

value.name: ProviderUsed
value.description: A code indicating the lookup provider used to locate the album details. (0 = No Match Found, 1 = FreeDB local database, 2 = FreeDB online query, 3 = AMG local database, 4 = AMG online query, 5 = Manual changes made to album)

value.name: CoverURL
value.description: The URL to use to download the cover art

value.name: CoverAvailable
value.description: True if cover art is available.

command.name: GetTrackRange
command.description: Retrieve a set of tracks based on the supplied startRow, rowCount and Filter expression. This is an optimised routine which is designed for fast track range retrieval from; all available tracks, local server, device or share. It was original created to support "All Songs" functionality in the Henrot service.

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results (listing) into

parameter.name: StartRow
parameter.description: The offset of the first row to retrieve. This is relative to any filter expression.

parameter.name: RowCount
parameter.description: The number of rows to return. If there are less rows matching the Filter expression than requested then additional following rows will be added to the row set.

parameter.name: Filter
parameter.description: A filter expression. Only tracks whose SortName begins with this expression will be returned. The filter should not contain any wildcard characters.

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of a device or share (if required). This parameter is mandatory if the storage parameter is 2 or 3.

parameter.name: Storage
parameter.description: Where is the music stored? 0 = All music, 1 = Local Server, 2 = Network, 3 = Portable.

responsevalue.name: GetTrackRange_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of tracks in the listing

value.name: TrackKey
value.description: Unique identifier of the track

value.name: Name
value.description: The name of the track

value.name: SortName
value.description: The name of the track (minus any track number prefix)

value.name: Type
value.description: The type of the track

value.name: Length
value.description: The length of the track

value.name: Created
value.description: The date the track was created

value.name: LastModified
value.description: The date the track was last modified

value.name: Ordinal
value.description: The ordinal (sort order) of the track in the parent playlist.

value.name: ExtendedInfoAvail
value.description: Is extended music information available for this track?

value.name: Storage
value.description: Where is the music stored? 0 = Unknown, 1 = Server, 2 = Network, 3 = Portable

value.name: SampleRate
value.description: The number of samples per second.

value.name: BitsPerSample
value.description: The number of bits in each sample.

value.name: ChannelCount
value.description: The number of audio channels in the track.

value.name: AllTracksOffset
value.description: The offset of this track within the listing of all tracks (ordered by the SortName column).

command.name: SetCoverImage
command.description: Uploads a new image for an album.

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the album to upload cover art for.

parameter.name: ForceOverwrite
parameter.description: If true the image will always be overwritten, if false the command will not overwrite existing image files

parameter.name: ImageData
parameter.description: A serialized version of the image file contents where each byte is represented as a 2 digit hex value

responsevalue.name: Success
responsevalue.description: True if the image has been overwritten

command.name: RemoveCoverImage
command.description: Remove a cover image for the specified album.

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the album whose cover image will be deleted.

responsevalue.name: Success
responsevalue.description: True if the image has been removed.

command.name: CheckCoverImage
command.description: Get the cover image ftp path of a specified track.

parameter.name: Address
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of a track to search.

parameter.name: ImageSize
parameter.description: 1 = small (61x61), 2 = medium (126x126), 3 = large (320x320), 4 = extra large (640x640).

parameter.name: AddressType
parameter.description: 1 = track, 2 = album, 3 = cd source (default=1).

parameter.name: Local
parameter.description: Flag determining the format of the response. FTP location vs local path (default=0).

parameter.name: Protocol
parameter.description: The protocol to use for the return path, if the Local parameter is false (0). This can be either "FTP" (for backward compatibility) or "HTTP" (default).

parameter.name: ImageFormat
parameter.description: The format of the cover image file. This must be "JPG", since "BMP" is no longer supported. "JPG" is the default.

responsevalue.name: CoverImageName
responsevalue.description: Returns the name of the cover image file. This will be blank if no image file exists.

responsevalue.name: CoverImageURI
responsevalue.description: Returns the URI used to access the cover image file. The format of this URI depends on the values of the Local and Protocol parameters. This will be blank if no image file exists.

command.name: ForceHostUpgrade
command.description: Perform an upgrade for a specific host

parameter.name: RoomID
parameter.description: The room ID to use for this command.

command.name: ForceDBRebuild
command.description: Force a remote Database to rebuild on a specific host the next time the services restart.

command.name: PurgeImageCache
command.description: Purge the image cache on a specific host

parameter.name: All
parameter.description: Perform purge across all cover art or only those which have been generated.

command.name: BulkCDLookup
command.description: Perform a CD lookup for one or more existing albums.

parameter.name: SearchNumber
parameter.description: The destination search number to place the results into

parameter.name: AllAlbums
parameter.description: Perform lookup across all albums satisfying other criteria or only those for which a lookup has not been successful.

parameter.name: Interval
parameter.description: Lookup interval in days. This is the number of days since the last lookup, and controls which albums will be selected.

parameter.name: IgnoreProviderUsed
parameter.description: If this parameter is true then any lookup provider can be used to locate a match for the album. If this is false then last provider used for a given album will be set as a minimum provider. It basically means that if set to false, then a FreeDB match will not override an AMG match (for example).

parameter.name: AlbumKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative addresses of specific Album(s) to use

responsevalue.name: BulkCDLookup_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of albums affected by the command, and therefore the number of rows returned by the command.

value.name: PlaylistKey
value.description: Unique identifier of the album

value.name: Success
value.description: True if the lookup for the album was successful, false if it failed.

value.name: Message
value.description: The message associated with the album's lookup operation.

command.name: BulkCDLookupEx
command.description: Add a CD lookup for one or more existing albums to the CD Lookup queue.

parameter.name: LookupProviderUsed
parameter.description: A code indicating the minimum level of lookup provider to use for the selection. (0 = No Match Found, 1 = FreeDB local database, 2 = FreeDB online query, 3 = AMG local database, 4 = AMG online query, 5 = Manual changes made to album)

parameter.name: Interval
parameter.description: Lookup interval in days. This is the number of days since the last lookup, and controls which albums will be selected.

parameter.name: AlbumKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative addresses of specific Album(s) to use

responsevalue.name: BulkCDLookupEx_Return
responsevalue.description: The number of albums affected by the command.

value.name: Status
value.description: The current status of the queue row. Can be one of the following values; Awaiting Retry, "Pending, In Progress, Error, Complete, Unknown

value.name: Retries
value.description: The number of retry attempts to date

value.name: LastError
value.description: The last error associated with the queued request

value.name: CreatedDate
value.description: The date the request was created

value.name: CreatedTime
value.description: The time the request was created

value.name: ModifiedDate
value.description: The date the request was last modified

value.name: ModifiedTime
value.description: The time the date was last modified

value.name: LastRetryDate
value.description: The date the request was last retried

value.name: LastRetryTime
value.description: The time the request was last retried

value.name: AlbumKey
value.description: The album key of the album to be looked up.

value.name: AlbumName
value.description: The name of the album associated with the queued lookup.

command.name: PromoteShareToMusicStore
command.description: Promotes a share to a music store creating, if neccessary, the required filesystem entries. The command will fail if the share is already owned by another server and change ownership is false.

parameter.name: ShareKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the share to promote

parameter.name: ChangeOwnership
parameter.description: If true the command will forcibly take owenership of the music store irrecpective of the content of the control file.

responsevalue.name: PromoteShareToMusicStore_Success
responsevalue.description: Returns True/False reflecting the success of the update.

responsevalue.name: PromoteShareToMusicStore_Message
responsevalue.description: Contains the error message if the command fails.

command.name: DemoteMusicStoreToShare
command.description: Promotes a share to a music store creating, if neccessary, the required filesystem entries. The command will fail if the share is already owned by another server and change ownership is false.

parameter.name: MusicStoreKey
parameter.description: The absolute or relative address of the music store key to demote

parameter.name: Deactivate
parameter.description: If true the commans will ensure the share is marked as inactive after the command completes irrespective of the current state of the active flag.

responsevalue.name: DemoteMusicStoreToShare_Success
responsevalue.description: Returns True/False reflecting the success of the update.

responsevalue.name: DemoteMusicStoreToShare_Message
responsevalue.description: Contains the error message if the command fails.
